des: Grow your business revenue by optimizing and improving your digital presence. Data Driven Daily Marketing and Web Design Tips from Paul Hickey, CEO of Data Driven Design, a Digital Strategy Agency specializing in driving business results. Your Data Driven Daily Tip includes Google Analytics, Web Design, Social Media Ads, Search Engine Optimization and Conversion Optimization.
